bookSourceComment:
标签屏蔽在 搜索 和 发现 屏蔽相关标签书籍
标签说明https://www.uaa.com/novel/tags

(可以 搜索地址 修改separator的值为你觉得输入方便的字符，默认为@@ )
搜索时可使用  关键词@@标签  来进行附加标签搜索。 前面为搜索的关键词 ，@@后面的是标签，多个标签之间用 逗号( ,， )隔开。
关键词留空可直接搜索标签
exploreUrl:
<js>
//分类 category
let categoryList = [
	{
		title: "都市激情",
		type: "都市激情"
	},
	{
		title: "校园春色",
		type: "校园春色"
	},
	{
		title: "乡村爱情",
		type: "乡村爱情"
	},
	{
		title: "系统异能",
		type: "系统异能"
	},
	{
		title: "家庭乱伦",
		type: "家庭乱伦"
	},
	{
		title: "穿越重生",
		type: "穿越重生"
	},
	{
		title: "经典武侠",
		type: "经典武侠"
	},
	{
		title: "同人改编",
		type: "同人改编"
	},
	{
		title: "科学幻想",
		type: "科学幻想"
	},
	{
		title: "东方玄幻",
		type: "东方玄幻"
	},
	{
		title: "娱乐明星",
		type: "娱乐明星"
	},
	{
		title: "历史架空",
		type: "历史架空"
	},
	{
		title: "西方魔幻",
		type: "西方魔幻"
	},
	{
		title: "贤者小说",
		type: "贤者小说"
	},
]
//状态 finished
let statusList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ""
	},
	{
		title: '已完结',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '连载中',
		type: 0
	}
]
//篇幅 space
let spaceList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ''
	},
	{
		title: '短篇',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '中篇',
		type: 2
	},
	{
		title: '长篇',
		type: 3
	}
]

let list = [];
formatUrl = (space, category, finished) => {
	return `/api/novel/app/novel/search?category=${category}&finished=${finished}&space=${space}&excludeTags={{getExcludeTags();}}&size=40&page={{page}}`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (spaceItem of spaceList) {
	pushItem(`篇幅（${spaceItem.title}）`, "", 1);
	for (categoryItem of categoryList) {
		statusList[0].title = categoryItem.title;
		for (statusItem of statusList) {
			pushItem(`${statusItem.title}`, formatUrl(spaceItem.type,categoryItem.type,statusItem.type), 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//账号注册
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	let password = result.get("密码");
	let checkCode = result.get("邮箱验证码");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}
//获取验证码
function getVerificationCode() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	if (loginName) {
		let body = `email=${loginName}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/sendCheckCode';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}

function searchExcludeTags() {
	let excludeTags = this.getExcludeTags();
	//java.log(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
	java.longToast(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
}

function resetExcludeTags() {
	let data = getData();
	data.ExcludeTags = [];
	setData(data);
	//java.log("标签屏蔽已重置");
	java.toast("标签屏蔽已重置");
}

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {
		data.ExcludeTags.push(tag);
	} else {
		data.ExcludeTags.splice(index, 1);
	}
	//java.log(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	java.toast(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	setData(data);
}
</js>

function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(Get('url') + '/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&mobile=2');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
if (ck.includes('auth=')) {
    var J= org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(Result);
    var user = J.select('.text-center')[1].text();
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), user);
} else {
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"),'');
}
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读记录', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&type=lishi&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url')));
type = J.select('[data-field="category_id"]');
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
自己花了差不多一下午做出来的，第一次做的书源。特此发出来给自己纪念一下，也不算是完全自己做的吧。这个书源之前有大佬做了一下那个发现，只做了一个那个最新那个列表，其他的都是我看着关耳大佬的视频和那个规则自己一边抄一边写下来的。那个发现列表里面的那些规则是我把直接把源代码给了AI之后，然后再给他那个格式，让他照着格式给我写出来的！还有那个搜索，不知道为啥我做到一半之前好好的，然后突然又搜不出来了，可能之前的大佬也是因为搜不出来所以就没有做搜索那个规则吧？我自己照着关耳大佬的视频抄的不知道什么时候失效，失效了也不要找我，因为我真的是个小白，我也不会改。
                                        ——特此纪念
                                   ——by.Lai

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

bookSourceComment:
💡APP端发现
💡仅搜索书名和作者，搜索链接中的searchType指排序方式，1积分，2更新时间，3发表时间，4字数，5收藏，7相关性，默认为7
💡【我的收藏】里的标签均为晋江网页版收藏，默认按更新时间排序，需要登录，留了6个空白标签用于按收藏的分类显示，参照“尚未分类”里的链接，把c=0改为自己对应分类的id（用手机打开网页版收藏对应分类，网址里的c=后面的那串数字就是id，如https://m.jjwxc.net/my/fav?c=37334中，37334即为id）
💡默认删除作话的感谢投雷，如果显示了“作者有话要说”却没内容，就说明全是感谢投雷
💡正文默认不拼接评论，如需查看评论，请把另一个晋江源的正文规则粘贴过来

本书源最初是参考的酷安乃星和关耳小姐姐，以及源仓库用户O。
by 酷安 @viviyaaa   分享注明出处

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

$=result;

lock=$.islock!='0';

num=''
}else{num=num}

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';

于是就用手机版的【搜索】顶替电脑版的【搜索】。

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

不设置或0清空显示全部列表。

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B
